name: Beyond Warp Gate
body:
# As an introduction

* Name: Yutian Li, sometimes called Kevin
* Email: [kevinleeone@gmail.com](mailto:kevinleeone@gmail.com)
* [GitHub](https://github.com/kevinleeone)
* LinkedIn: TBU
* Resume: TBU
* Education:
  * I'm currently on an exchange program at [the University of Texas at Austin](http://www.utexas.edu/)
  * I'm a junior year computer science student at [Tsinghua University](http://www.tsinghua.edu.cn/publish/then/)

# Projects and Experience

## World Crisis Database
* Time: December, 2013
* Repository: Private, ask me for permission!
* Link: [Heroku](http://cs373wcdb.herokuapp.com/)
* Description:

  An app that emulates [IMDB](http://www.imdb.com/) in displaying worldwide crises and related people and organizations.
  It implements a [RESTful](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Representational_state_transfer) API for connecting with and retrieving data from the server.
* Tools:
  * [Python](http://www.python.org/)
  * [Django](https://www.djangoproject.com/)
  * [Heroku](https://www.heroku.com/)
  * [AngularJS](http://angularjs.org/)
  * [Bootstrap](http://getbootstrap.com/)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
